title: New: No Middle Name – Fading Photo
content:
Love the gorgeously romantic edge to this new track from David Bailey aka No Middle Name, lifted from his forthcoming second LP.

There’s an 80’s tinge to the songwriting, whilst the sound recalls the likes of Beach Fossils or Wild Nothing. ‘I didn’t fall in love to feel this bad’ – a sentiment I’m sure we can all relate to. Check out Fading Photo below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
